divs: sighting detailsi watched fox six news this evening in san diego and saw the video of the ufo that was captured by a group of people near the city shortly after the new year. i am writing because i saw the exact same thing on 12\6\07. i live in an ocean view apartment in encinitas, ca. at approx. 10-11 pm, i noticed a series of 8 or so evenly spaced lights moving up and down out over the ocean. they weren't that high in the air and were in the direction of san clemente island. the brightness of each dot varied with intensity. as soon as one would start to dim, it would then start to brighten again. they were visible for just a couple of minutes. i hope this can be explained. if you need any additional information, feel free to call or email. i verified the date by looking at my christmas tree receipt. i am positive that the day is accurate.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Encinitas
There were no other sightings in Encinitas on or around December 6th 2007
Summary: Series of 8 or so lights moving up and down in the direction of San Clemente Island
